headline: Hot Springs Cuts Non-Revenue Water Loss Nearly in Half with Digital Solutions from Xylem
summary: WASHINGTON, November 19, 2024--Hot Springs, Arkansas, addresses water loss with Xylem’s advanced leak detection and plans further improvements with virtual district metering areas.
